author: Lucy Craymer
title: Global Stocks Cool After Surge on News of Talks With Pyongyang
text:
U.S. stocks higher after jobs report Inflation concerns ease Korea news boosts Asian stocks U.S. stocks jumped Friday after an upbeat February jobs report eased investors’ concerns about the potential for a rapid acceleration of inflation.
Those inflation fears, which had griped markets in recent weeks and contributed to a surge in volatility, diminished after data from the Labor Department released Friday showed that wage growth slowed in February.
